name: Corb
description:
CORB Consultoría Informática was founded with the mission of converting social and business needs into high-quality, high-value computing solutions for national and international clients. With a vast experience in consulting and software development, we provide projects and advice in critical areas of the business of our clients and friends. 
The quality of our services, always complying with delivery times and responsibility are the values that allow us to earn the trust of our customers and generate business friendships.
